mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.business_plan_id AS "businessPlan.id", a.timestep_id AS "timestep.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.timestep_no AS "timestep.timestepNo", b.timestep_name AS "timestep.timestepName", b.starttime AS "timestep.starttime", b.endtime AS "timestep.endtime", b.create_by AS "timestep.createBy.id", b.create_date AS "timestep.createDate", b.update_by AS "timestep.updateBy.id", b.update_date AS "timestep.updateDate", b.remarks AS "timestep.remarks", b.del_flag AS "timestep.delFlag", b.status AS "timestep.status"
